website_summaries.verdict: An affordable rest mat that doesn't compromise on quality or functionality.
pros: Vinyl 1-inch-thick mat is comfortable and resistant to spills
Durable grey binding keeps the seams from ripping
Sits at a quality price point, perfect if you have multiple kids in daycare
4-section mat folds up for convenient storage
cons: Space between each of the 4 sections is about 2 to 3 inches, and there is no foam in this area

customer_reviews.title: This mat is cheaper in other stores, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that after I bought this on Amazon, I found it for half the price at Wal-Mart and Target. My daughter needed a rest mat for preschool this year that had to be a minimum of 1 inch thick. I wish they came in a larger size as my daughter is very tall and is already about as long as this mat. It isn't very wide, either. I do like that it gave the option to buy one with binding so that way the mat doesn't fall apart or get holes in the edges like the heat sealed version does.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Even the 1 inch is pretty thin. I would definitely NOT go with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews we went with the 1 inch mat. Even the 1 inch is pretty thin. I would definitely NOT go with the 5/8 inch. Kids use them for daycare and seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described. Read measurements before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to look at the measurements. This is a much smaller Kender Matt then I have purchased in the past. However, the product description is accurate on the size, I just did not realize that it was smaller than average. It works great for my 18 month old but I don’t see it being usable for anyone over 2. I am giving four stars because it is not a true Kender Matt when it comes to children in kindergarten, or the other sizes that are typical for a Kender Matt
customer_reviews.author: SydK

customer_reviews.title: Used for daycare- falls apart after one year or less
customer_reviews.text: These did the trick until they started falling apart and splitting at the seams. They don't meet the code of my daycare rules anymore so now I am in the market for some better quality nap mats.
customer_reviews.author: Esther R. Fairgraves

customer_reviews.title: Bought new and came used!?-UPDATED-
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this NEW and it came used!? A name was written on the kindermat and scribbled out with permanent marker....seriously! Dont have time to return since she needs to tomorrow. Filing a complaint this is NOT ok! ‐---UPDATE: I was finally able to contact kindermat, they sincerely apologized and sent us a new mat.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby to lie on during our move. I remember sleeping on one of these when I was 5, almost 30 years ago. It’s easy to wipe down, folds for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my sons naps at preschool! I do like the grey part around the edges, adds extra support.
customer_reviews.author: kjohn

customer_reviews.title: What I needed for preschool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these, 1 at a time. I did this in order to determine if the quality was good for the first one. I hate wasting money on things that I would have to replace soon enough because of it falling apart. These are made well and will be perfect for my rough and tumble boys. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carissa AS

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this item today and realized that it was passed the return date, however the item is not worth purchasing in my opinion and is super tiny and uncomfortable. I am surprised by the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco milian

customer_reviews.title: Veey happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: No tears on the sides! This mat has reinforced seams on the edges to prevent tears. Purchased this for my daughter at daycare. No worries regarding tearing at the seams. Daycare will make you replace if so. Body pillow cases fit tbis mat perfectly as well. Veey happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: kacie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat for preschool. I love the reinforcement along the edges. Easy to wipe down. I use with a nap mat cover that I found on Amazon...it has PBS kids on it an my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DenaliBear

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My son has been using this and he sleeps well on it during his nap time at daycare. Well put together. Still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Calissi

customer_reviews.title: where's the binding?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat specifically for the binding that came around it. Delivered with no binding. Could of just picked this one up from Wally world for much cheaper. So annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Drevlow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for naps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid for Mother’s Day out. It is so easy to clean and folds up nicely. It has lasted us 4 years now and only second kiddo is using it now. Great buy for the money. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany kessel

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My nap mat arrived wet "inside the bag" I had to open the bag and let the mat dry. When it dried great product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even look like anything is in there grasp sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with this item as it is too thin and flimsy. Spend the money and buy something decent.
customer_reviews.author: Mama_New

customer_reviews.title: 1" mat is dinky
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the description before buying the 1" thick mat, because I bought the 2" thick mat a year ago. The 1" mat is so short compared to the 2".
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: All the stores were sold out and this is exactly what we needed at a great price. Easy more cushiony from the one that I used to have when I was a kid. He's going to live his big boy matt for kindergarten!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put sleep mats on. Very nice and the kids sleep soundly!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed for my daughter's classroom!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ... Everything is as described (1-in KinderMat & dimensions). Exactly what we needed for my child's classroom!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. We usually go through 2 per year. The teachers love them because they're very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mat for school. They last about 2 years with everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: The mat lasts about 2 years with 5 days a week use.
customer_reviews.author: Katg013

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Mat
customer_reviews.text: I was for some reason thought it would be a little wider. Other than that it great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Didn’t even last a week before it tore.
customer_reviews.author: JRDS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mat is small and light, but cushioned enough for when our kids play. Doesn't have much grip, so it does slide a bit. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old approved!
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful, my little 2 yr old cousin loves it for his daycare. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: The binding edge was better that the mat from the previous year
customer_reviews.text: The KinderMat arrived faster than we thought even tho order was placed at the last minute. The binding edge was better that the mat from the previous year. Also softer. Great product for price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: KinderMat
customer_reviews.text: Came the next day my doggie is glad to have it again

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how expensive it was but Walmart was sold out of theirs at $9.97and my daughter needs it for kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: laura l johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nap time mat for school
customer_reviews.text: Great nap mat for my son to have a preschool. Some mats were way overpriced; this one for the price works fine and he says its comfy.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Pretz Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I use the mats for my children in my care. They are much stronger than the bindless ones. I bought these because they were a good price for the product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  R. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Kinder sleeping mats
customer_reviews.text: I like the mats I have purchased. They are of good size & easy to fold. They fit up to an average 5 year old size. We are please with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pami Herzig

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for pre k class
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandsons pre k class. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Garnigan

customer_reviews.title: A++ GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Our daycare needed a mat so we bought one....... know we have 4. one for daycare one for each grandma and one in the car for naps on the go. This is a good product that is exactly how it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Smallest Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: The smallest mat you have ever seen for 19$...my old changing pad is larger than this. Purchased for my Kindergardener for school but this Kindermat is not for any child older than an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect priced and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Its everything they say it is. Durable, easy to clean and folds down for easy storage. We use this for grandchild to take at kindergarten for nap time and at home for snack and watch a movie time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Castaldi

customer_reviews.title: Four year old approved
customer_reviews.text: Me: "How's your sleep mat bud?" Four year old son: "Good." Me: "Is it comfy when you nap at school?" Four year old son: "Yes." That's five stars ladies and gentlemen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for the after-care naps. A good thickness, that makes nap time comfortable for the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Desiree

customer_reviews.title: These are tiny, even for my two year-olds! ...
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny, even for my two year-olds! I'm not sure the seam will hold up either as it seems very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Alpers-Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works for preschool!
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for preschool. Could have more cushion, but overall a good, affordable nap mat for school.

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bit pricey but she had to have it for school good quality

customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like the picture! It’s small, flat and only has 3 squares instead of the 4 in the picture!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nap Mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters school for her nap time . She sleep very comfortable and it’s easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I would buy more than one, so you will have one clean in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a quadriplegic and needed something to ease the pain from his tailbone; a friend gave me this mat and it relieved him of the pain. So now, I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Benny Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for what we needed. It is easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 2 year old daughter and was the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 2 year old daughter and was the perfect size for her. There is a bigger size nap mat so if your child is older than 2-3 i would find the larger mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mallarie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it to tumble on. I love it because I use it when I have to make tub bed when the kids are sick.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Much better made than others.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect nap mat for my 4 year old just starting all day pre-k. It's nice because it wipes down easily and the edging is a great touch.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for my 5 year old

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I've had the 2 inch mat before and it's a lot wider and longer, so when I got this one I was expecting it to be the same width and length just thinner, but it wasn't. It's ok but almost too small for anyone over 2 which doesn't fit my needs well. I tried this one over the 2 inch because the 2-inch rips over time. They're both just ok.

customer_reviews.title: It is durable and very easy to use however she is 6 and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am rating this product with 3 starts because of its durability! I didn't do as much research as I should have before buying this product and I was looking for something a little larger for my daughter to sleep on. It is durable and very easy to use however she is 6 and it is a tad too small for her.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school naps
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her nap mat. It's thick enough to provide a comfortable rest, and it's easy to wipe down. I'm fully satisfied with the purchase.

product_meta.title: KinderMat, 1" Thick KinderMat, 4-Section Rest Mat, 45" x 19" x 1", Red/Blue with Grey Binding, Great for School, Daycare, Travel, and Home, Made in the USA
feature_bullets: 100% MADE IN THE USA – the 1" Thick Tri-Fold KinderMat is 100% Made in the USA and contains the highest quality USA materials
EASY TO CLEAN - this Original KinderMat is easy to clean – simply use warm water and soap or a gentle cleaning wipe. The USA made materials will stand up to playtime and cleaning over and over
HIGH-QUALITY - this Original KinderMat is made of USA Made high-quality, dense foam using radio-frequency heat-sealed technology keeping liquid out and preventing the growth of harmful bacteria
AFFORDABLE AND DURABLE – this Original KinderMat is extremely durable and safe. Kid tested and Kid approved since 1951. KInderMats are perfect for daycares, preschools and home school use
CERTIFIED AND SAFE - this Original KinderMat Full Cover Sheet is KINDERGREEN CERTIFIED meeting the highest levels of regulatory safety standards and compliance with international ethical supplier

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars503 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
